ygData.subject: Re: Question about skill advancement.
ygData.msgSnippet: Dark warrior of the kith? What is the kith?
ygData.messageBody:
Dark warrior of the kith? What is the kith?

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 3:00 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Don't get your self killed for the sake of getting your skills maxed out
> for that level. Your skills will advance it may take a couple levels but
> they'll eventually get maxed out. If I were to go by your strategy of
> getting my self killed so my skills would be maxed out per level, I'd
> still be 25 working on my reposte skill, I'm almost 28th, so don't expect
> everytime that you get a new skill that you will have it maxed out by the
> time you make your next level.
>
> As far as factions are concerned.....one of the biggest advantages of
> being "evil" is that you can kill any good NPC you want to, and some of
> the good NPCs drop really nice loot. Personally I can't wait till I get
> high 40s and I can walk into freeport and whoop up on some guards (with a
> good evil party of course) :)
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Tom Swift" <tswift@...> 5.18.99 12:10:55 PM >>>
>
> I am Bael, a warrior of the 15th Order and a dark elf. At the start of
> this level I put 20 points each into dual wield and double attack. I am a
> little over a bubble away from 16 and my skills are now 65 for dual wield
> and 72 for double attack. My rate of advancement has slowed considerably,
> I am wondering if I should expect to max these at 80 before I hit 16 or if
> that is uncommon.
>
> If I can max them I will likely get myself killed right before i level up
> in order to buy some more time at 15.
>
> By the way I am using a combine scimitar and tentacle whip against magical
> opponents and dual mino axes against non-magical opponents. My max damage
> per round is 79, that is double attacks on both weapons with max
> damage(17) and a max damage kick (11).
>
> And in reference to others questions about faction. It is easy enough to
> gain enough faction for the Commonlands vendors to deal with you, just
> kill orcs by the dozens. I kill every orc I see, pawns, centurions and so
> on. You can get Freeport residents to deal with you by completing the orc
> slashed belt quest repeatedly. If you do that tho you faction with the
> Paladins in North Freeport will get worse. It is up to you whether West
> and east freeport are more important to you then North Freeport
>
> Bael
> 15th Order
> Indigo Brotherhood
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: the best source for group communications.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
>
